definition: Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)

sentences.english: Strengthening training of labor vocational skills , enhancing the proportion of non-farming population.
sentences.chinese: 加强劳动力职业技能培训，提高非农人口所占比重。

sentences.english: Roads account for 90% of all passenger journeys made in Britain.
sentences.chinese: 公路交通占英国人出行比重的90%。

sentences.english: The sturdily constructed instrument optically measure specific gravity of aqueous solutions.
sentences.chinese: 坚固结构光学仪器用于测量水溶液的比重。

sentences.english: In addition, managerial accounting places considerable weight on non-monetary data.
sentences.chinese: 另外，管理会计将相当多的比重放于非货币数据上。

sentences.english: In virtue Hong banyan the proportion that stood in all tree kinds biggest.
sentences.chinese: 在德宏榕树在所有树种中站的比重最大。

sentences.english: A window corresponding to the gravimeter operating mode will then appear.
sentences.chinese: 与比重计操作方式相应的一个窗口然后将出现。

sentences.english: Share figures are derived from unrounded figures.
sentences.chinese: 比重数字是以未经进位数字计算。

sentences.english: The bicapillary pycnometer is a tool for accurate determination of density.
sentences.chinese: 双毛细管比重瓶是一种用于精确测量液体密度的仪器。

sentences.english: Shares are derived from unrounded figures.
sentences.chinese: 比重是以未经进位数字计算。

sentences.english: However, women had similar rates of nonmedical prescription drug use as men did.
sentences.chinese: 然而，滥用处方药的男女比重比较接近。

sentences.english: More damagingly , the manufacturing sector carries an 80% weightage in the index.
sentences.chinese: 危害更大的是，生产部门在指数中占到80%的比重。

sentences.english: Among all the researches of visual imagery, the emphasis is on memorial imagery.
sentences.chinese: 在视觉表象的研究中，记忆表象占有很大的比重。

sentences.english: I love three people, the wife am accounting for the proportion which is unable to surmount.
sentences.chinese: 在心底里我爱着三个人，我老婆占着无法超越的比重。

sentences.english: The problem for the years ahead is to work out an acceptable theory of weighting.
sentences.chinese: 未来的工作难题是要作出一个可接受的比重理论。

sentences.english: The proportion of middle-income earners in the whole population increased.
sentences.chinese: 扩大中等收入者所占比重。

sentences.english: The Reiterative Locutions in 《The Book of songs》account for quite a proportion.
sentences.chinese: 《诗经》中双音迭词，在经文中占很大比重。

definition: to take possession of/to occupy/to take up
year after year/with each passing year/over the years

pinyin: guo2 nei4 sheng1 chan3 zong3 zhi2
